title: Cant log on game_"Unspecified error occurs"_ISP TPG
body:
Cant log on games since last night. but the game can be logged on when i use my mobile network.
I logged on this morning by using TPG connection, but game dead after 8 minutes, and couldn't log on again.

replies.body: TPG does not have good relations with Riot. I'm surprised you got League running at all.
